title: raamaa raamaa raamaa naapai
sahitya:
rAma rAma rAma nApai nI daya rAka uNDavaccunA O rAma

caraNam 1

 tanayuni E jAtiyaina brOvani talliyu bhuvini galadA O rAma
   
caraNam 2

 tanaku tAnu vancana cEsukonu dhanavantuDu galadA O rAma
   
caraNam 3

 ilanu niscayamuga nIvu lEni tAvendainanu galada O rAma
   
caraNam 4

 sutuni mATaku talli taNDrulu asUya bADuta galada O rAma
   
caraNam 5

 brahma niSuDainaTTi A ghanuniki prabala vancana galada O rAma
   
caraNam 6

 tolli jEyu karmamanu bhavimpakanu tOyuvAru galarA O rAma
   
caraNam 7

 kanaka taramu lAsalEni samsArulu kalanainanu galarA rAma
   
caraNam 8

 nirvikAra shrI tyAgarAjuniki ninnu vinA galarA O rAma
